00079 static inline my_float_t
00080 deg2rad(my_float_t deg)
00081 { return deg/180.0 * M_PI; }
00082 
00084 inline my_float_t 
00085 dist_squared(const my_float_t a[3], const my_float_t b[3])
00086 {
00087   my_float_t sum = 0, tmp = 0;
00088   for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00089     tmp = b[i] - a[i];
00090     sum += tmp*tmp;
00091   }
00092   return sum;
00093 }
00094 
00096 inline my_float_t 
00097 dist(const my_float_t a[3], const my_float_t b[3])
00098 { return std::sqrt(dist_squared(a,b)); }
00099 
00102 inline my_float_t 
00103 normalize(my_float_t* X, const uint ndim=3)
00104 {
00105   my_float_t* x = X;
00106   my_float_t mag = 0;
00107   for(uint i = 0; i < ndim; ++i, ++x) mag += (*x) * (*x);
00108   mag = std::sqrt(mag);
00109   x = X;
00110   for(uint i = 0; i < ndim; ++i, ++x) *x /= mag;
00111   return mag;
00112 }
00113 
00115 inline my_float_t
00116 unit_vector(my_float_t* n, const my_float_t* head, const my_float_t* tail)
00117 {
00118   for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i, ++head, ++tail, ++n) *n = *head - *tail;
00119   return normalize(n - 3);
00120 }
00121 
00122 //my_float_t dot(const my_float_t* U, const my_float_t* V);
00123 
00125 inline my_float_t 
00126 dot(const my_float_t* U, const my_float_t* V)
00127 {
00128   my_float_t rv = 0;
00129 //  const my_float_t *v = V;
00130 //  const my_float_t *u = U;
00131   for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i, ++U, ++V) rv += *U * (*V);
00132   return rv;
00133 }
00134 
00136 void cross(const my_float_t* U, const my_float_t* V, my_float_t* rv);

00143 inline void
00144 mid_point(const my_float_t* A, const my_float_t* B, my_float_t* M,
00145           const int N = 3)
00146 {
00147   std::copy(A, A + N, M);
00148   my_axpy(N, 1.0, B, 1, M, 1);
00149   for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i) M[i] *= 0.5;
00150 }
00151 
00153 template<class T> inline const int 
00154 argmin(T* vals, int len, T* min_val)
00155 {
00156   if(len < 1) return -1;
00157   int idx = 0;
00158   *min_val = *vals;
00159   for(int i = 0; i < len; ++i)
00160     if(*min_val > vals[i]){
00161       *min_val = vals[i];
00162       idx = i;
00163     } 
00164   return idx;
00165 }
00166 
00168 template<class T> inline const int 
00169 argmax(T* vals, int len, T* max_val)
00170 {
00171   if(len < 1) return -1;
00172   int idx = 0;
00173   *max_val = *vals;
00174   for(int i = 0; i < len; ++i)
00175     if(*max_val < vals[i]){
00176       *max_val = vals[i];
00177       idx = i;
00178     } 
00179   return idx;
00180 }
00181 
00183 template<class T> inline const int 
00184 argmaxabs(T* vals, int len, T* max_val)
00185 {
00186   if(len < 1) return -1;
00187   int idx = 0;
00188   my_float_t tmp = (*vals < 0 ? -1.0 * (*vals) : *vals);
00189   for(int i = 0; i < len; ++i){
00190     my_float_t m = (vals[i] < 0 ? -1.0 * vals[i] : vals[i]);
00191     if(tmp < m){
00192       tmp = m;
00193       idx = i;
00194     } 
00195   }
00196   *max_val = *(vals + idx);
00197   return idx;
00198 }

00340 class sphere{
00341 public:
00342   sphere(const my_float_t *center, const my_float_t radius)
00343   {
00344     std::copy(center, center + 3, A_c);
00345     A_r = (radius < 0 ? -1.0 * radius : radius);
00346     A_rsquared = radius*radius; 
00347     A_vol = 0.0;
00348   }
00349 
00350   bool
00351   operator==(const sphere &S) const 
00352   {
00353     if(S.A_r == A_r && S.A_c[0] == A_c[0] && S.A_c[1] == A_c[1] && 
00354        S.A_c[2] == A_c[2]) return true;
00355     return false;
00356   } 
00357   
00358   ~sphere() {;}
00359 
00360   my_float_t volume()
00361   {
00362     if(A_vol == 0.0) A_vol = 4.0/3.0 * M_PI * A_rsquared * A_r; 
00363     return A_vol;
00364   }
00365 
00366   void
00367   proj2surf(const my_float_t *pt, my_float_t *pt_on_sphere) const
00368   {
00369     my_float_t dir[3];
00370     unit_vector(dir, pt, A_c);
00371     std::copy(A_c, A_c + 3, pt_on_sphere);
00372     my_axpy(3, A_r, dir, 1, pt_on_sphere, 1);
00373   }
00374 
00375   my_float_t A_c[3];
00376   my_float_t A_r;
00377   my_float_t A_rsquared;
00378   my_float_t A_vol;
00379 };

00390 class circular_segment{
00391 public:
00392   //friend bool merge(circular_segment *A, circular_segment *B);
00393 
00394   typedef enum{
00395     NO_POINT = 0,
00396     FIRST_POINT,
00397     SECOND_POINT,
00398     BOTH_POINTS
00399   }intersect_type; 
00400 
00401   circular_segment(const my_float_t *p0, const my_float_t *p1, 
00402                    const my_float_t *in_dir, const my_float_t *center)
00403   {
00404     std::copy(p0, p0 + 3, A_p0);
00405     std::copy(p1, p1 + 3, A_p1);
00406     std::copy(in_dir, in_dir + 3, A_in_dir);
00407     std::copy(center, center + 3, A_circle_center);
00408     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i) A_mid_pt[i] = 0.5 * (A_p0[i] + A_p1[i]);
00409   }
00410 
00411   circular_segment(const circular_segment &src)
00412   {
00413     if(this == &src) return;
00414     std::copy(src.A_p0, src.A_p0 + 3, A_p0);
00415     std::copy(src.A_p1, src.A_p1 + 3, A_p1);
00416     std::copy(src.A_circle_center, src.A_circle_center + 3, A_circle_center);
00417     std::copy(src.A_in_dir, src.A_in_dir + 3, A_in_dir);
00418     std::copy(src.A_mid_pt, src.A_mid_pt + 3, A_mid_pt);
00419   }
00420 
00421   // Idea -- if the vector from this chord's end point to the end point from 
00422   // the other chord has a positive projection onto the in direction, then
00423   // that end point from the other chord is inside this circular segment
00424   intersect_type
00425   intersects(const circular_segment &other_seg)
00426   {
00427 #if 0
00428     my_float_t p0_to_x[3];
00429     std::copy(other_seg.A_p0, other_seg.A_p0 + 3, p0_to_x);
00430     my_axpy(3, -1.0, A_p0, 1, p0_to_x, 1);
00431     bool p0_inside = false;
00432     if(dot(A_in_dir, p0_to_x) > 0.0) p0_inside = true;
00433 
00434     std::copy(other_seg.A_p1, other_seg.A_p1 + 3, p0_to_x);
00435     my_axpy(3, -1.0, A_p0, 1, p0_to_x, 1);
00436     bool p1_inside = false;
00437     if(dot(A_in_dir, p0_to_x) > 0.0) p1_inside = true;
00438 #endif
00439 
00440     // Still have a problem if both end points are the same
00441 
00442     bool p0_inside = false;
00443     bool p1_inside = false;
00444     if(contains(other_seg.A_p0)) p0_inside = true;
00445     if(contains(other_seg.A_p1)) p1_inside = true;
00446 
00447     intersect_type rv = NO_POINT;
00448     if(false == p0_inside && false == p1_inside) rv = NO_POINT;
00449     else if(true == p0_inside && true == p1_inside) rv = BOTH_POINTS;
00450     else if(p0_inside) rv = FIRST_POINT;
00451     else if(p1_inside) rv = SECOND_POINT;
00452 
00453     return rv;
00454   }
00455 
00456   bool merge(circular_segment *B)
00457   {
00458     circular_segment::intersect_type A_pts_in_B = intersects(*B);
00459     circular_segment::intersect_type B_pts_in_A = B->intersects(*this);
00460     if(NO_POINT == A_pts_in_B && NO_POINT == B_pts_in_A) return false;
00461     if(BOTH_POINTS == B_pts_in_A) return true;
00462     if(BOTH_POINTS == A_pts_in_B){
00463       std::cout << "Attempting to assign to *this\n";
00464       *this = *B;
00465       return true;
00466     }
00467   
00468     // else update the end points of the chord (and arc)
00469     if(A_pts_in_B == FIRST_POINT){
00470       if(B_pts_in_A == FIRST_POINT) std::copy(B->A_p1, B->A_p1 + 3, A_p0);
00471       else std::copy(B->A_p0, B->A_p0 + 3, A_p0);
00472     }else{ 
00473       if(B_pts_in_A == FIRST_POINT) std::copy(B->A_p1, B->A_p1 + 3, A_p1);
00474       else std::copy(B->A_p0, B->A_p0 + 3, A_p1);
00475     }
00476   
00477     // MUST UPDATE THE IN DIRECTION !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
00478     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i) A_mid_pt[i] = (A_p0[i] + A_p1[i]) / 2;
00479     unit_vector(A_in_dir, A_mid_pt, A_circle_center);
00480   
00481     my_float_t interior_vector[3];
00482     if(B_pts_in_A == FIRST_POINT)
00483       unit_vector(interior_vector, B->A_p0, A_circle_center);
00484     else unit_vector(interior_vector, B->A_p1, A_circle_center);
00485   
00486     if(dot(A_in_dir, interior_vector) < 0.0)
00487       for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i) A_in_dir[i] *= -1.0;
00488   
00489     return true; 
00490   }
00491 
00492   // Ignore the radius for now
00493   bool
00494   contains(const my_float_t *pt)
00495   {
00496     std::cout << "\nCheck for Chord containment\n";
00497     std::cout << "pt: " << pt[0] << " " << pt[1] << " " << pt[2] << "\n";
00498     std::cout << "mid_pt: " << A_mid_pt[0] << " " << A_mid_pt[1] << " "
00499               << A_mid_pt[2] << "\n";
00500 
00501     // Doubt we need unit vector here
00502     my_float_t pt_dir[3];
00503     unit_vector(pt_dir, pt, A_mid_pt);
00504     std::cout << "pt_dir: " << pt_dir[0] << " " << pt_dir[1] << " "
00505               << pt_dir[2] << "\n";
00506     std::cout << "dot prod: " << dot(A_in_dir, pt_dir) << "\n\n";
00507     if(dot(A_in_dir, pt_dir) < 0.0) return false;
00508     return true;
00509   }    
00510   
00511   const my_float_t* 
00512   chord_endpt_one() const 
00513   { return A_p0; }
00514 
00515   const my_float_t* 
00516   chord_endpt_two() const 
00517   { return A_p1; }
00518 
00519 private:
00520   my_float_t A_p0[3];
00521   my_float_t A_p1[3];
00522   my_float_t A_mid_pt[3];
00523   my_float_t A_in_dir[3];  
00524   my_float_t A_circle_center[3];
00525 };

00583 
00589 template<typename Const_Iter> void
00590 get_bounds(Const_Iter begin, Const_Iter end, my_float_t* min_pt, 
00591            my_float_t* max_pt, int ndim = 3)
00592 {
00593   // Spin through the positions to find the min and max values
00594   std::copy(begin->pos, begin->pos + ndim, max_pt);
00595   std::copy(begin->pos, begin->pos + ndim, min_pt);
00596   for(Const_Iter p = begin; p < end; ++p){
00597     for(int i = 0; i < ndim; ++i){
00598       if(max_pt[i] < p->pos[i]) max_pt[i] = p->pos[i];
00599       if(min_pt[i] > p->pos[i]) min_pt[i] = p->pos[i];
00600     }
00601   }
00602 }
